name: Okidogi
flavorText: After all its muscles were stimulated by the toxic chain around its neck, Okidogi transformed and gained a powerful physique.

previous.name: Sinistcha
previous.flavorText: It pretends to be tea, trying to fool people into drinking it so it can drain their life-force. Its ruse is generally unsuccessful.

next.name: Munkidori
next.flavorText: The chain is made from toxins that enhance capabilities. It stimulated Munkidori's brain and caused the Pokémon's psychic powers to bloom.

pokemon.name: Okidogi
pokemon.flavorText: After all its muscles were stimulated by the toxic chain around its neck, Okidogi transformed and gained a powerful physique.
